title: Interpretation of a dream about collecting eggs from under a hen

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing eggs collected under a hen in a dream: To see some eggs shows goodness and money, and many eggs show judgments and fears, and many children may appear, and an egg for one of them shows that his marriage is approaching, and eggs in a dream are among the visions that he sees many. There are people in their dreams, and the dreamer feels fear and anxiety about this dream and continues to search for many meanings and interpretations of this dream and wonders whether this dream is good or bad and this we will learn about through the following article. Interpretation of a dream about collecting eggs from under a hen for a girl: If an unmarried girl sees eggs In a dream, this means that for that girl there is someone who is proposing to her and this person wants to marry her. Also, seeing a white girl in a dream indicates that this girl has good morals, good health, and happiness. But if one girl sees in a dream that she is collecting eggs, this indicates that this girl She was facing many difficulties and crises, but after this dream will end and these difficulties will disappear. Interpretation of the vision of collecting eggs from under a chicken for a married woman: If a married woman dreams that she is collecting eggs, this means that this woman will soon be heralded for pregnancy and good offspring, God willing. But if a married woman sees In a dream, she is eating boiled eggs, this means that this woman will enjoy a good and wonderful life and will get a lot of money that she does not expect to get. If the eggs that the married woman saw in the dream are broken, this indicates that this woman will fall between her and her husband. Big problems will lead to If a pregnant woman dreams that she is collecting eggs, this means that this woman will give birth to a female and that female will be very beautiful. Likewise, if a pregnant woman sees Eggs in a dream, this means that the date of birth of that pregnant woman is approaching and that her birth will be smooth and easy. But if a pregnant woman sees egg yolks in a dream, this indicates that this woman will feel very tired during pregnancy and this fatigue will continue with her after giving birth. Seeing broken eggs in a dream For a pregnant woman, it indicates that this woman’s pregnancy is at risk of not being completed. She may fall and lose her fetus. Interpretation of a vision of collecting eggs from under a chicken for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees that she is collecting eggs in a dream, this indicates that this woman will be reunited with her husband. She will live a happy life with him and be compensated. About the life that I lived before. Interpretation of the vision of collecting eggs from under the chicken for a person. If a man sees in a dream that he is breaking eggs, this indicates that this man is a wife. She loses her fetus if she is pregnant and the woman and her fetus become sick. But if a man sees in a dream that he is collecting a lot of eggs This indicates that this man will promise a lot of money and a lot of sustenance very soon, and this was not expected. Interpretation of the vision of collecting eggs from under the chicken by Ibn Sirin According to Ibn Sirin: If a man sees in a dream that he is collecting eggs, this indicates that this man .

title: Interpretation of a dream about a body without a head

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about a body without a head in different situations. The Greek philosopher Thales says that a healthy mind is in a healthy body, so what if you find yourself in a dream as a body without a head, this is certainly difficult and its effect on the soul is undesirable, and therefore in this article in the encyclopedia we will learn about the interpretation of a dream The body without a head. Follow us. Interpretation of a dream about a body without a head. There are some wonderful dreams that we see during sleep that may cause laughter or may cause terror in our souls. Among these dreams is that a man or woman dreams that a living body is walking without a head. It is known that the head is evidence of Wisdom, where a person rules the whole world through his mind inside him, and this dream can be good or bad. Interpretation of seeing the head in a dream Ibn Sirin says: The head is the leader of man, and therefore what is in the head is good, it is good for man in general, and what befalls him With evil, it is hated by him. Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi say about the size of the head and its relationship to the dream: Big head: indicates high status, pride, and pride, and may indicate that someone will dominate a group of people or that they will earn money from where they do not expect it at all. Small head: Its meaning is the exact opposite of the big head, as it indicates low status, evil, and lack of honor. Above the head: indicates goodness and livelihood in all aspects. If he is poor, he becomes rich, if he learns, he increases in knowledge, if he is single, he gets married, and if he is alone. He will start a family, etc. The upside-down head: related to travel, if he wants to travel, his journey will be disrupted, and if he is traveling, he will return to his homeland. Interpretation of cutting off a head in a dream. Interpreters have many opinions on the topic of cutting off a head in a dream. Some of them say that it frees one from slavery, which means that He will get rid of the person who is trying to blackmail him or harm him. If he sees that someone he knows is standing right in front of him and then someone comes and beheads him, it means that the person who was beheaded will find relief from his elders because of his work and perhaps leave him. If one sees in a dream that someone is being punished by cutting his throat, or that the dreamer’s head has fallen into his hands, this means that he will lose a family member and very close to him, or lose a child. He or one of his parents. Whoever sees a severed head and enters into a conversation with it, this is good news because he will earn a lot of money. A dreamer who sees a group of severed heads lying in one place means that the owners of these heads will meet in the place where their severed heads were found. If The dreamer saw a child with his throat cut, this means that the dreamer feels anxious and walks among people unconsciously like a small child who does not understand things well. If the dreamer cuts his own head, this indicates that his relationship with God Almighty is not good and that he must extend the rope of communication between him and God. Once again, he performs righteous acts of worship. To get a different interpretation of dreams, you can visit the instant dream interpretation application.

title: Interpretation of a dream about falling from a mountain for single and married women according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about falling from a mountain: There are many dreams that people see in a dream, and there are many interpretations and interpretations of dreams according to the form of the vision. A mountain is one of the interpretations that the interpreters have interpreted, referring to many connotations and signs. Interpretation of a dream about falling from a mountain for a single woman. Scientists have interpreted the dream of falling From a mountain for a single woman, as this dream ranges between signs of good and evil and it is one of the dreams that can cause great anxiety to an unmarried girl and the interpretation of a dream about falling from is interpreted by leading interpreters with aspects of interpretation, then: The interpretation of a dream about falling from a mountain indicates in The dream of an unmarried woman indicates happy occasions for this girl. As this girl will soon begin an engagement or marriage project, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of a dream about falling from a mountain for an unmarried woman, and this mountain was high, which led to her injuries. This indicates that there are many problems And the difficulties that this girl faces. In addition to the difficulty of these problems and his inability to solve them and overcome the difficulties. When an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is falling from above. This indicates that there are many upcoming stages that this girl will go through in the future. Moreover, It is a sign of changing circumstances for the better by the will of God Almighty. The dream interpretation of falling from a mountain indicates the presence of a strong man in her life. In addition, it could refer to a husband, father, or anyone close to her and shows attachment and help to the world. But if an unmarried woman sees a mountain In her dream, she felt safe and beautiful, as this indicates her marriage to a person she desires and pleases. See also: I dreamed that I was reading Ayat al-Kursi. Interpretation of a dream about reading Surat al-Kursi in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about falling from a mountain and dying. Interpretation of a dream about falling from a mountain and dying is one of the dreams that raises the dreamer’s anxiety, as it indicates This dream has many connotations and connotations ranging from good to evil. The mountain, and is represented as follows: When the dreamer sees that he fell from a mountain and that mountain is high, this indicates crises and problems that the dreamer will face. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he fell from a high place and wakes up and falls into a mosque, this indicates his repentance. But if An unmarried girl saw in her dream that she fell from a height and died, so this bodes well for her. This dream shows this girl’s transition from her life to a new life. As for death, it indicates the happy life that you will live and fulfill your desires. Also, the interpretation of a dream about falling from a mountain or From a high place in general is evidence of new transformations. As for seeing falling from a high place and dying, this dream shows the fears that live within the dreamer. This dream also indicates new changes in the dreamer’s life, whether for the better or for the worse. If the dreamer dreams of falling from A mountain or a high place in his home, this indicates the plight of his family. See also: Interpretation of a dream about marriage in a dream for a married and single woman, by senior interpreters Interpretation of dreams for Saqou

title: What is the interpretation of seeing yourself escaping from the police?  ..good or bad;

preview.html: The science of dream interpretationThe interpretation of dreams is a science mentioned in the Holy Qur’an. Many prophets saw in a dream many visions that were later realized, and it is a talent that God gave to some students and readers of the Qur’an. And the Sunnah and understanding the meanings of bananas and its verses. The World: Commentators have many ways of deriving interpretation, and this is not exclusive, but rather can be increased in view of the knowledge of the passage, the perfection of its skills and religion, and opening it with this knowledge, and God guides whomever He wills to the straight path.” Therefore, the world of dreams is a vast and vast world full of symbols and signs. Interpretation of escaping in a dream: A person in pajamas is often seen running and chasing, as if he is afraid of something or happening from certain people, such as the police, enemies, or dogs, and is running away from things that affect the person and make him feel With horror, like a vision, escape in a dream is interpreted as follows: Escape in a dream has many meanings, and in the Book of Miracles in the Interpretation of Dreams in the Qur’an, the interpretation of escape is like this, as if a person is fleeing from enemies and is lost, and God. Angry with him. Whoever sees in a dream that he is running from death, this means that death will defeat him. To see in a dream that I am escaping to the Kaaba or one of God’s mosques on the basis of piety. Whoever dreams of escaping from dogs or anxiety is safe from enemies. By interpreting the vision of escaping Whoever has a plain will be safe from turmoil and injustice. Seeing him running away from a woman in a dream means that a person is searching for the afterlife, and he is searching for the path of guidance, justice, and prosperity, and abstains from desires. Interpretation of seeing the police in a dream: Seeing the police means anxiety, worry, emotions, and a disturbance of the mind, because his vision does not It gives good tidings, as it is a harbinger of something that will bring evil and sadness, God forbid, and this is what the Almighty says. In his beloved book in Surat Al-Qasas, verse 8, “Then the Pharaohs raised him up to summon them.” And Haman and their soldiers were sinners. It is said that the police in a dream is the angel of death and escaping from the police in a dream is a long life. The police in a dream interprets it as an adversity if you can overcome the person, but if he gets rid of him, he will be able to escape from depression and anxiety. The police indicate In a dream, it indicates panic, fear, and torture, especially if they arrest a person and terrorize him. The police in a dream is considered a person with power, malice, and hatred who is trying to pursue and trap the person. Escaping from the police in a dream is a good or bad thing. Escaping in a dream is evidence of a person’s desire to get away from something. Escape can be interpreted as bad if a person runs away from a stranger and gets afraid in a dream. As for the idea of ​​escaping from dogs, for example, it is a good vision and evidence of getting rid of fear, panic, and enemies. Seeing escaping from the police in a dream is explained that: If one sees in his dream that he is escaping from the police, this indicates that he is searching for happiness and peace of mind. Seeing him escaping from the police in a dream means that the dreamer has more concerns about the future. The police in a dream symbolizes Sadness and sorrow, so getting rid of them and escaping is survival and happiness. If the police catch a person in a dream, it is evidence of the existence of some problems...

title: Interpretation of a dream about a jaw in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about Ibn Sirin’s jaw. Interpretation of dreams: A jaw in a dream without teeth is a sign of severing kinship ties and spending money on hateful things. A dream about rotting teeth in a dream inside the jaw indicates that he treats his family with ugliness. If a person sees in a dream that he is treating his teeth at a doctor, this is evidence of Restoring some things that he lost. Interpretation of seeing a jaw by Al-Nabulsi. If anyone sees a dream, if something comes out of the jaw, it shows the diet and quality it gets. If you see a closed jaw in a dream, it means lies and lies. Seeing a jaw full of water indicates the disappearance of money and its extreme scarcity. Interpretation A single woman’s dream of seeing a jaw: If an unmarried girl sees paralysis in her jaw and her inability to move it, this indicates her inability to earn money. A crooked jaw in a girl’s dream indicates that she is living an unstable financial life. A girl’s dream of a dental vibrator in her jaw Evidence of an unstable psychological and financial condition. Interpretation of seeing the jaw for a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream that her teeth are falling from her jaw to her hand, this is evidence of longevity. The vibration of a married woman’s teeth in a dream inside her jaw is a sign of the financial crisis she is facing. Teeth falling out from The jaw in a dream is evidence of the statements that this woman rushes and regrets. Interpretation of seeing the jaw for a pregnant woman: Seeing the teeth inside the jaw in a dream and they are in good health, this indicates the safety of the fetus and the ease of birth. If he sees teeth falling from the jaw onto the clothes, this is evidence of the birth of a male child. Interpretation of a dream about a man’s jaw: Seeing a young man in a dream with his teeth falling out - his jaw - this indicates paying off debts and meeting needs. Teeth extraction in a dream and the appearance of new teeth in the jaw is evidence of success at work, gaining livelihood and kindness. A married man who sees teeth being removed from his jaw in a dream indicates marital problems. Add The dream that you would like to interpret by referring to your marital status is in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Stealing in a dream is good news, so what is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation?

preview.html: Stealing in a dream is good news. Stealing in a dream has many meanings and connotations that may indicate that a person does many wrong things and actions, and it may mean that the dreamer is a just and pure person and may God reward him well. The correct interpretation depends on the condition of the dreamer and the details of the vision. Theft in a dream is good news. According to Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation, it has been stated that theft in a dream brings good news, because it means that this person will obtain great benefit and a lot of money and will be happy with it. He is significant in society. If the dreamer sees that Stealing in a closed place, this dream is not good because it means that the dreamer will be weak and will be tempted by some temptation. title: Interpretation of a dream about buying someone else’s car in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about buying a car for someone else in a dream according to Ibn Sirin, there are many dreams that we have in a dream, and since each of these dreams has many different explanations and explanations, which are interpreted based on many details related to the dream as well as related to the dreamer’s social status and status. Psychologically, one of these dreams is the dream of buying a car, as it is considered one of the common dreams that many people dream of, whether in reality or even in a dream, and through this article we will learn about the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream of buying a car for someone else and all the interpretations related to it.Interpretation of the dream of buying Someone else's car by Ibn Sirin The great scholar Ibn Sirin is considered one of the most famous dream interpreters, as he has many different interpretations of many different dreams that have been interpreted based on many details related to the dream and the social status of the dreamer, in addition to his psychological state. The situation as well as the circumstances that accompany the dream, and among these dreams is the dream of buying a car for someone in a dream, it is considered one of the dreams that carry in its content many different connotations and interpretations. If the vision is of buying a car for another person in a dream according to Ibn Sirin, then this is an indication that the patron The vision will gain great status and high status. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is buying a new car for another person, then this vision is a sign of the luxurious life that the dreamer will live with his family. Whereas if the dreamer sees in a dream that he is buying a car for another person in a dream, and it is broken, that is, with If there is any defect, this is an indication that the dreamer is exposed to many problems and difficulties that prevent him from achieving it. title: Learn more about the interpretation of seeing a horse in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a horse in a dream and interpreting its vision The horse is considered one of the animals that are characterized by a beautiful shape and many types and different colors such as white, blond and brown. One of the oldest horse breeds is the purebred Arabian horse, which is characterized by the beauty of its shape and nature. It is worth noting that the interpretation of seeing horses in a dream varies according to the situation and the gender of the viewer. The horse in a dream If a married woman sees in her dream that the horse has gone blind in its eyes or has become eyes, this means that she will suffer from a serious illness or will spend years of poverty and material hardship. When a married woman sees horses entering her house, this is a sign that she has an inheritance and abundant strength awaiting her, and she will obtain it soon. If the dreamer sees a stray horse in his dream, this means that he does not have a great degree of wisdom that allows him to solve his problems and will fall victim to his desires and lusts. When the dreamer sees that the horse in his dream is tied up, this means that he will conquer all his enemies and defeat them with a great defeat. When the dreamer sees a sick horse in a dream, this indicates the calamities that the dreamer will fall into or the loss of a person dear to his heart. Seeing a horse with wings in a dream indicates The status and pride that the dreamer will achieve. When the dreamer sees that he is riding a fast horse, this means that he will be able to achieve everything he desires in a short time and without difficulty. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he has turned into a horse, this means that he is characterized by all the qualities of horses and lives a decent and dignified life. If a pregnant woman sees a horse in her dream, and its shape is beautiful, this means that she will pass the pregnancy period safely and will give birth to a child with a good shape and reputation. If the dreamer sees horses flying in the sky, this means that the country will fall into wars that will lead to its destruction. When the dreamer sees in a dream that he is running away from horses, this means that he is not doing well in the abundant good that God has blessed him with. Interpretation of a horse in a dream for a girl If a girl dreams of a horse, this is a sign that her desires will come true and she will achieve many goals for her. When a girl sees that there is a young man riding a horse and coming to her from afar, this is evidence that God announces to her the arrival of happy news related to her marriage to a righteous and righteous young man. If an unmarried woman sees that she is riding a horse that takes her to places she does not know, this means that she is making rash decisions And wrong in her life leads her to ruin and loss. If a girl dreams that she fell from a horse, this means that she will suffer a great loss in her work or that her engagement will not take place. When a girl dreams that she is riding a horse and can control the horse, this means that she will enter into a large business and will be able to manage it well. You have a dream that confuses you waiting for it .. Egyptian Google site for interpreting dreams. Riding in a dream for a single woman When an unmarried girl sees herself riding a horse, this indicates that she is married to a wealthy, very religious and wise man. If an unmarried woman sees a hippopotamus in her dream, this means that she is busy achieving an important goal in her life, but this
